title: Dashboard page
editNameRancherSuccess: Your Managed Rancher service name  has been updated.
editNameRancherError: An error has occurred. Please try again later.
generateAccesModalDescription: A temporary password will be generated for your Rancher. To view it, please click “Confirm”
createRancherDiscoveryMode: You are currently in Discovery mode. To finish creating your resource, you must activate your project.
createRancherInfoMessage: Your usage will be billed on an hourly basis, depending on the total number of vCPUs on each of the worker nodes in your Rancher downstream clusters, with at least 20 vCPUs charged.
createRancherDescription: You can manage multiple downstream clusters within this service.
createRancherServiceLevelDescription:
Both plans offer all the Rancher features. With OVHcloud Edition, you can only create
“downstream clusters” on the OVHcloud Public Cloud, with self-managed nodes added individually. The Standard plan is perfect for private, multi-cloud and edge cloud uses. You can migrate to the Standard plan at any time. Control plane nodes are not billed.
createRancherVersionDescription: This service is powered by SUSE Rancher. OVHcloud supports the latest versions of Rancher. We recommend using the latest version. We apply security patches and provide new releases on a regular basis, in accordance with our software lifecycle policy.
createRancherError: An error has occurred creating your Managed Rancher Service.{{rancherCreationErrorMessage}}.
createRancherOVHCloudPlanDescription: Create or manage Managed Kubernetes Service or ‘self-managed’ ‘downstream clusters’ on OVHcloud Public Cloud, or via your own machines. You can also register external clusters (without cloud management)
createRancherStandardPlanDescription: Create or register downstream clusters on any Rancher-supported public cloud, or on an automatable private cloud (e.g., VMware vSphere), including scenarios supported by the OVHcloud Edition solution.
createNameModaleHelperInput: The service name must be between 3 and 63 characters, must start and end with lower-case alphanumeric characters (a to z and 0 to 9), and may include the following punctuation marks: ‘_’ ‘.’ and ‘-’.
generateAccessModalPasswordDescription: Copy this temporary password to log in to your Rancher. After logging in, you will be prompted to create a new password for security reasons.
updateOfferModalDescription: You are about to update your current solution to the {{availableServicePlan}} solution. You will be billed {{planPricing}} ex. VAT/hour per orchestrated vCPUs. The changes will take effect right away, and will have no impact on your downstream clusters or the data in your managed Rancher. Please confirm if you wish to continue.
updateOfferPending: Your solution upgrade has been processed. Please wait... This may take a few minutes.
upgradePlanDescription: Create or register downstream clusters on any Rancher-supported public cloud, or on an automatable private cloud (e.g., VMware vSphere), including scenarios supported by the OVHcloud Edition solution.
